name: Aether - Short Alpha Demo
description:
This is a super short demo of the beginning of a game. In it, you face off against laser gun wielding airship pirates using just your serving tray.

WASD - Move

Space - Roll

Right Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse -

     If aiming: Throw tray

     Otherwise: Deflect shot

Music by TeknoAXE

Aether uses Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere. Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2019, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
